<%inherit file="base.html"/> <%namespace name="tocns" file="toc.html"/> <%namespace name="nav" file="nav.html"/> <%page args="toc, extension"/> ${tocns.toc(toc, extension=extension, paged=False)} <%def name="title()"> SQLAlchemy Documentation % for file in toc.filenames: <% item = toc.get_by_file(file) %> % if not item.requires_paged: ${nav.pagenav(item=item, paged=False, extension=extension)} ${self.get_namespace(file + '.html').body(toc=toc, extension=extension, paged=False)} % endif % endfor
